title: Poster, "10th Anniversary, Shakespeare Festival of Dallas", 1981
inscribed: Printed in black, lower margin: COPYRIGHT 1981 WOODY PIRTLE, INC./PRINTING: WILLIAMSON PRINTING COMPANY/PAPER: CLAMPITE PAPER COMPANY (65 POUND STAR WHITE VICKSBURG COVER)/TYPOGRAPHY: TYPOGRAPHICS
description: Poster depicts close-up abstract portrait of Shakespeare wearing a blue-gray beard and green collar, before a partial cake with 10 lit candles. Below, text in yellow on gray ground: 10TH ANNIVERSARY / SHAKESPEARE FESTIVAL OF DALLAS / As You Like It Romeo and Juliet Kemp’s Jig, An Elizabethan Road Show / In Repertory July 10-August 2, 1981 Band Shell, Fair Park Gates Open 7:15 pm, Curtain 8:15 pm / Admission Free No Performances on Mondays.

tombstone.epitaph: Poster, "10th Anniversary, Shakespeare Festival of Dallas", 1981. Lithograph on paper. 1984-22-1.
